trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Saratoga
There were no other sightings in Saratoga on or around September 3rd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to smoke a cigarette looked up at sky to see if I could see any stars to see what the weather was like, I noticed a bright star, looked away for a moment then looked back because the star was so bright I thouhgt it was unusual, as I looked back at the star it went from being completely still to moving at a high rate of speed towards the West. Object was very high and very bright, moved very fast but not as fast as a shooting star would appear. the object definately went from not moving to moving . I realized what I was seeing was not normal I, kept track of it for a few seconds and shined my flashlight in its direction primaraly for shits and giggles to see if it would stop again. It disappeared in the West sky in the clouds I felt that I had witnessed a u.f.o and felt that I should report it incase the governernment keeps tabs on this site they can note that there was a u.f.o in the area at the time.
Summary: very bright light, high, altitude, not moving, I stared at the object because it was far brighter than any star, object went from stationary to moving at high rate of speed
